name: MY HAREM RPG
description:
My Harem RPG - (Working Title) Is currently in development.  It is a mobile/desktop idle-rpg game with dungeons, loot and lewdity.

The game is in the early stages of development and we will happily take any feedback and input from the community.

The intended release date is Winter 2018 on Android. Other platform dates are TBA.

Consider making a one-tine donation on our Maker Support page, Become a Patronor just stop by in our discord: HERE :D
